title: Hypnotic Failure (feat. Zac Amico & Chris Faga)
description:
Zac Amico and Chris Faga join The Bonfire! DJ Lou tells the gang about getting hypnotized by a friend's girlfriend to try to quit smoking and that opens up debate on whether hypnosis has any basis in reality.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
